org.forgerock.openidm.cluster

Class ClusterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.cluster.ClusterManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler, ClusterManagementService

    @Service
@Properties(value={@Property(name="service.vendor",value="ForgeRock AS."),@Property(name="service.description",value="Cluster Management Service"),@Property(name="openidm.router.prefix",value="/cluster*")})
public class ClusterManager
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler, ClusterManagementService
    A Cluster Management Service.

      • renewRecoveryLease

        public void renewRecoveryLease(String instanceId)
        Description copied from interface: ClusterManagementService
        Renews the Cluster Management Service's recovery lease. This should be used by listener's to prevent the recovery from timing out during the processing of an recovery event.
        Specified by:
        renewRecoveryLease in interface ClusterManagementService
        Parameters:
        instanceId - the ID of the instance being recovered
